/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a vibrant urban landscape. Cars can be seen in motion on the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. In the distance, a bridge stretches across the frame, connecting different parts of the city. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly green and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the cityscape.
